mainEntity.name: Is Flowxtra ATS compliant with Canadian privacy laws?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. Flowxtra adheres to PIPEDA, GDPR, and CPRA requirements with secure EU data hosting and consent management workflows.

mainEntity.name: Can I collaborate with multiple hiring managers?

acceptedAnswer.text: Flowxtra includes collaborative pipelines, scorecards, and approval steps so recruiters, hiring managers, and agencies work in sync.
